tweet: A little misleading. The Dow is a price weighted Index. This is not abnormal in anyway. In fact, the equally-weighted S&P is handily outperforming the traditional cap-weighted S&P... the “average stock” is acting better than the Index. That’s the real story here.
On top of this, Consumer Discretionary (equal-weight) just made multi-month relative highs vs. the S&P.  Positive message... #SPX #XLY #Consumer

Homebuilders remain impressive, and continue to turn up after a terrible ‘18 campaign. Reminiscent of their leadership revival after a weak 1994. Stay long. @StrategasRP @DanCliftonStrat #SPX #housing #stocks @Lennar @DRHorton @PulteHomes @tollbrothersinc  https://t.co/g01yjQn7T6
